bibl.title: P. Haun. III 58: Caranis in the Fifth Century.
bibl.note: Restored version of P. Haun. III, 58, of 15 May AD 439, a sworn declaration about water rights, certainly the latest dated document from Caranis. Suggestions relate to the prescript and to the letter group κατινον, representing a transliteration of the Latin word catinus, 'basin'.
bibl.seg: REA John, P. Haun. III 58: Caranis in the Fifth Century.

Restored version of P. Haun. III, 58, of 15 May AD 439, a sworn declaration about water rights, certainly the latest dated document from Caranis. Suggestions relate to the prescript and to the letter group κατινον, representing a transliteration of the Latin word catinus, 'basin'.
